short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalize your interactions in Gmail by adding Showpad Content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Showpad empowers teams to deliver revenue-driving experiences by empowering sales and marketing with relevant content and training to engage buyers. 

Showpad for Gmail lets sellers personalize emails sent with the latest on-brand content and track which content actually resonates with their buyers. The Gmail extension allows account teams to work from one platform, increasing their active selling time to investigate new opportunities, engage with buyers, and follow up on ongoing deals. With the latest update, sharing via Gmail feels as intuitive as on the Web app. The new content picker interface mirrors the familiar Showpad experience, making email sharing more natural than ever.

Features included in this integration:

- Email the latest on-brand Showpad content right from Gmail
- Track which content resonates with your buyers in Showpad
- Automatically log all sent emails and interactions with shared content through Gmail in Showpad and any CRM platform
- Seamless and intuitive experience that closely mirrors the Showpad Web app

Showpad for Gmail is available for all Showpad customers.
